Articles.Content: I recently downloaded the sunbeam laser addon. In a file marked \'sources\' there are a number of .cs files (for instance PidController.cs) Where in the main KSP file are these supposed to go?

source is uncompiled code that you can edit the mod if you so wish or look through to know if it will screw with your computer if you know the language just leave it alone other wise all you have to do is put the other files in X folder so parts and plugins otherwise leave the source alone =)
